content: the "uses" of address are very adequate for a patient but for an organization should they be extended?

home | work | temp | old | billing
seems patient-focused
for an organization it would be best to express things like "primary" or "official"
Organization has Organization.contact that allows you to designate all sorts of different purposes
Ok, but the valueset for Address seems to have ignores that address is not only "person address", doesn't it? And it is required binding.
So addres.use does not seem applicable if it's address of organizations..
Right. You'll generally omit 'use' for organizations. (Though 'mobile' might still be relevant.)
